title: Classic Jump Rope & Sidewalk Games
description: Miss Mary Mack and Double Dutch! How well do you remember the jump rope chants and sidewalk games of your childhood?

questions.question: In Double Dutch jump rope, how many ropes are being turned at the same time?
The famous jump rope chant 'Miss Mary Mack, Mack, Mack, all dressed in black, black, black' continues with what?
options: Had a house on a hill
Had a little dog, dog, dog
Went to the store, store, store

questions.question: In the classic jump rope rhyme 'Cinderella, dressed in yella,' where did Cinderella go?
What sidewalk game involved tossing a small object into numbered squares and hopping to retrieve it?
What was the small object typically used as a marker in hopscotch?
The jump rope chant 'Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear, turn around' asked the jumper to perform what during the rhyme?
What type of jump rope was favored for Double Dutch because of its weight and speed?
In the jump rope counting rhyme that starts 'Ice cream soda, cherry on top,' what was being counted?
options: How many boyfriends or girlfriends you would have
How many scoops of ice cream you wanted
How many years until you got married

questions.question: What hand-clapping game, often played by pairs of girls on the sidewalk, featured the rhyme 'A sailor went to sea, sea, sea'?
The game of Jacks, often played on sidewalks, required what two items?
options: A small ball and metal jacks

questions.question: In the jump rope game called 'Hot Pepper,' what happened to the speed of the rope?
options: It stayed the same but jumpers had to do tricks
It was turned faster and faster

questions.question: Chinese jump rope (also called 'elastics') used what instead of a regular rope?
The hand-clapping song 'Say, say, oh playmate, come out and play with me' invited a friend to do what?
What was the term for jumping into a turning rope that was already being swung by two turners?
The jump rope chant 'Not last night but the night before, twenty-four robbers came knocking at my door' was followed by the jumper doing what?
options: Acting out the Spanish dancer verse
